'''Tama Watua''' is a character in {{poe2}}.

## Background

A famous aumaua apothecary, Tama has had the misfortune of getting captured while on one of his research outings. As it turns out, [Bipara](/bipara/) and her witches really do not take kindly to people trying to steal their alchemical secrets. Once freed, he becomes a high end alchemy vendor.

## Interactions

{{Interactions
|companion       =
|wares           = High end alchemical ingredients
|stronghold      =
|rest            =
|quests_started  =
|quests_involved =
|none            = 
|other           =
* If you had [Zahua](/zahua/) as a companion in {{poe1}}, Tama Watua will mention him if asked about the cauldron (though both [Serafen](/serafen/) and [Pallegina](/pallegina/) must be present)
* He can translate the [Encoded notes](/encodedNotes/) into [Deciphered notes](/decipheredNotes/), if asked for a reward.
* He can be saved during off-screen companion adventure [Lavender and Lye](/lavenderAndLye/) in {{poe1}}.
}}
